critique: The document expresses concern for Hispanic and Latino students and aims to promote educational equity, excellence, and economic opportunity. It acknowledges systemic inequities and barriers faced by this community. The document conveys a sense of hope and determination to address these issues and ensure a successful future for Hispanic and Latino students. It also expresses a sense of urgency and importance in addressing the challenges faced by this community, particularly in light of the COVID-19 pandemic. The document does not express any anger, disgust, or surprise.
